member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.IGPProcess
member.summary: The interface required by processes intended for use with the Geoprocessor.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.IGPProcess.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of the toolbox containing the tool from which this process was generated.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.IGPProcess.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of the toolbox containing the tool from which this process was generated.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.IGPProcess.ToolName
member.summary: The name of the tool from which this process was generated.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.IGPProcess.Alias
member.summary: The alias of the toolbox containing the tool from which this process was generated.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.IGPProcess.ParameterInfo
member.summary: For internal use only, do not modify.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.ProgressChangedEventArgs.Message
member.summary: Gets a string containing information about the tool definition, start-up time, and success or failure.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage
member.summary: Gets a double representing the percentage value suitable for displaying on a progress bar.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.ProgressChangedEventArgs.Show
member.summary: Gets a boolean value. True indicates that the tool will fire percentage events which indicate percentage progress and hence a progress bar could be shown to an end user. False indicates that no more percentage events will be fired and the progress bar can be removed; the tool has completed.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.ProgressChangedType
member.summary: Indicates which type of progress event is fired. For example, message, show or percentage.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.ProgressChangedType.Message
member.summary: Indicates that the ProgressedChangedEventArgs.Message property contains a string representing a message.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.ProgressChangedType.Percentage
member.summary: Indicates that the ProgressedChangedEventArgs.Percentage property contains a double representing the percentage of progress.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.ProgressChangedType.Show
member.summary: Indicates that the ProgressedChangedEventArgs.Show property contains a Boolean that indicates whether or not the Progress events are firing or have completed.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.AsyncExecutionInfo
member.summary: Holds all objects associated with an asynchronous executing tool. Used to repopulate the tool's parameters after async execution has finished.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor
member.summary: The Geoprocessor. Provides access to toolboxes and tools.
member.remarks: The Geoprocessor contains properties and methods which make it possible the execute tools, set global environment settings, add and remove toolboxes, and examine messages.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.#ctor
member.summary: Default Constructor

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.#ctor(ESRI.ArcGIS.Server.IServerContext)
member.summary: Default constructor for use with ArcGIS Server

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.AddError(System.String)
member.summary: Output an error message. When running within a script tool, message becomes part of the tool messages, otherwise outputs to console

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.AddMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Output an informative message. When running within a script tool, message becomes part of the tool messages, otherwise outputs to console.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.AddReturnMessage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Output message from the last tool executed. When running within a script tool, message becomes part of the tool messages, otherwise outputs to console.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.AddToolbox(System.String)
member.summary: Add a toolbox to the current Geoprocessing session by catalog path.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.AddWarning(System.String)
member.summary: Output a warning message. When running within a script tool, message becomes part of the tool messages, otherwise outputs to console.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.ClearMessages
member.summary: Clear the messages to be returned as tool message when running within a script tool.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.GetDataElement(System.Object,System.Object@)
member.summary: Provides access to the Basic Data Element

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.Execute(System.String,ESRI.ArcGIS.esriSystem.IVariantArray,ESRI.ArcGIS.esriSystem.ITrackCancel)
member.summary: Execute a tool within the current Geoprocessing session.
member.overloads: Executes a tool within the current Geoprocessing session using the IGPProcess.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.Execute(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.IGPProcess,ESRI.ArcGIS.esriSystem.ITrackCancel)
member.summary: Executes a tool within the current Geoprocessing session using the IGPProcess.
member.overloads: Executes a tool within the current Geoprocessing session.

summary.para: Test the existence of a given parameter value (GPValue or catalog path) the type of the data is optional.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.GetEnvironmentValue(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the value of an environment by name. The properties of the current Geoprocessing session.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.GetMessage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Return the message description by index of the last tool executed.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.GetMessages(System.Object@)
member.summary: Return all of the message descriptions of the last tool executed.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.GetParameterValue(System.Int32)
member.summary: Return the input command line or script tool parameter by index as a GPValue.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.GetReturnCode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Return the message error code (Error Messages Only) by index of the last tool executed.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.GetSeverity(System.Int32)
member.summary: Return the message severity by index of the last tool executed.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.ListDatasets(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return the list of feature datasets within the current workspace.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.ListEnvironments(System.String)
member.summary: Return the list of environments (properties) within the current Geoprocessing session.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.ListFeatureClasses(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return the list of feature classes within the current workspace or feature dataset within the workspace.

member.summary: Return the list of rasters within the current workspace.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.ListTables(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return the list of tables within the current workspace.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.ListToolboxes(System.String)
member.summary: Return the list of toolboxes within the current Geoprocessing session.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.ListTools(System.String)
member.summary: Get list of GeoProcessor Tools.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.ListWorkspaces(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a collection of workspaces in the current workspace based on a query string and type.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.LoadSettings(System.String)
member.summary: Load the current settings (toolboxes, environment values, etc) from a file on disk in XML format.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.Open(System.Object)
member.summary: Open an objector a namestring. Example a DEFeatureClass object will return an IFeatureClass.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.ParseFieldName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parse a field name within the given workspace. This will strip the connected user and database names.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.ParseTableName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parse a table name within the given workspace. This will strip the connected user and database names.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.QualifyFieldName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Qualify a field name within the given workspace. This will add the connected user and database names.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.QualifyTableName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Qualify a table name within the given workspace. This will add the connected user and database names.

member.summary: Register an object to recieve IGeoProcessorEvents.

member.summary: Remove a toolbox from the current Geoprocessing session by catalog path.

member.summary: Reset the environments to their initial state.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.SaveSettings(System.String)

member.summary: Set the output script tool parameter by index as a GPValue.

member.summary: Test for the presence of a schema lock (already open for writing) of a given file or dataset.

member.summary: UnRegister an object to stop recieving IGeoProcessorEvents.

member.summary: Returns the command line usage of a given tool by name.

member.summary: Validate the parameters (input) of a tool within the current Geoprocessing session.

member.summary: Validate a field name within the given workspace.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.ExecuteAsync(System.String,ESRI.ArcGIS.esriSystem.IVariantArray)
member.summary: Executes a tool asynchronously within the current Geoprocessing session.
member.param: an array of Strings representing the tool's parameters.
member.example:
This sample shows how to create the IVariantArray.
ESRI.ArcGIS.esriSystem.IVariantArray parameters = new VarArrayClass(); parameters.Add(mPath + mDatabase + @"\" + mFeatureClassName); //in_features parameters.Add(mPath + mDatabase + @"\" + mCopyFeatureClassName); //out_feature_class

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.ExecuteAsync(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.IGPProcess)
member.summary: Executes a tool asynchronously within the current Geoprocessing session using the IGPProcess.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.RepopulateParameters(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessing.IGeoProcessorResult)
member.summary: If the tool was executed with ExecuteAsync(IGPProcess) repopulates its paramters.

member.summary: Get the IGeoProcessor COM object

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.AddOutputsToMap
member.summary: Set whether resulting output datasets should be added to the application display.

member.summary: Return the number of messages of the last tool executed.

member.summary: Set whether or not to log the execution of geoprocessing tools.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.MaxSeverity
member.summary: Return the maximum severity of the message of the last tool executed.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.OverwriteOutput
member.summary: If this is true, then the output of process execution will overwrite existing output of the same name. If this is false and files of the same name as those output by process execution exist, the process execution will fail without overwriting the original files.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.ParameterCount
member.summary: Return the number of input command line or script tool parameters.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.Geoprocessor.Geoprocessor.TemporaryMapLayers
member.summary: Set whether new map layers are temporary by default.

summary.para: The ServerContext object used for working with ArcObjects in the GIS server.
ServerContext is a non-creatable object. References to non-creatable objects must be obtained through other objects.

member.summary: Fires when a Message has been created.

member.summary: Fires when the Progress has changed.

member.summary: Fires when the Tool starts executing.
